message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which holds immense value for us. Given its significance and the potential it has for you, I propose a price of $13,000 for it. This offer is tailored to ensure a fair exchange while maximizing the benefits for both parties. I believe this price reflects the true worth of the product while leaving room for negotiation if needed. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss further details.
